trans-unit.source: Defines a way to expose a custom <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Caching.FileChangeMonitor" /> object to a cache implementation.
trans-unit.target: 定義將自訂 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Caching.FileChangeMonitor" /> 物件公開給快取實作的方式。

trans-unit.source: In ASP.NET, the <xref:System.Runtime.Caching.Hosting.IFileChangeNotificationSystem> interface provides access to internal file-change notification management.
trans-unit.target: 在 ASP.NET 中，<xref:System.Runtime.Caching.Hosting.IFileChangeNotificationSystem>介面會提供內部的檔案變更通知管理存取權。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Runtime.Caching.Hosting.IFileChangeNotificationSystem> interface is used internally by the <xref:System.Runtime.Caching.HostFileChangeMonitor> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Runtime.Caching.Hosting.IFileChangeNotificationSystem>介面在內部使用<xref:System.Runtime.Caching.HostFileChangeMonitor>類別。

trans-unit.source: When a cache implementation runs in an ASP.NET application domain, ASP.NET implements an <xref:System.Runtime.Caching.Hosting.IFileChangeNotificationSystem> interface through the <xref:System.Runtime.Caching.ObjectCache.Host%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 當 ASP.NET 應用程式定義域中執行時的快取實作時，會實作 ASP.NET<xref:System.Runtime.Caching.Hosting.IFileChangeNotificationSystem>介面透過<xref:System.Runtime.Caching.ObjectCache.Host%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Runtime.Caching.HostFileChangeMonitor> class detects this property and uses the ASP.NET file-change notification system to evict cache entries based on file-change notification.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Runtime.Caching.HostFileChangeMonitor>類別偵測到此屬性，並使用 ASP.NET 的檔案變更通知系統收回根據檔案變更通知的快取項目。

trans-unit.source: In non-ASP.NET applications, there is no host environment that implements a custom <xref:System.Runtime.Caching.Hosting.IFileChangeNotificationSystem> interface.
trans-unit.target: 在非 ASP.NET 應用程式中，沒有任何實作自訂的主機環境<xref:System.Runtime.Caching.Hosting.IFileChangeNotificationSystem>介面。

trans-unit.source: As a result, the <xref:System.Runtime.Caching.HostFileChangeMonitor> class uses the <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher> class of the CLR.
trans-unit.target: 如此一來，<xref:System.Runtime.Caching.HostFileChangeMonitor>類別會使用<xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher>的 CLR 類別。

trans-unit.source: The fully qualified physical path of a directory or file to monitor for changes.
trans-unit.target: 要監控變更之目錄或檔案的完整實體路徑。

trans-unit.source: A reference to a method that implements the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Caching.OnChangedCallback" /> delegate.
trans-unit.target: 一個實作 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Caching.OnChangedCallback" /> 委派之方法的參考。

trans-unit.source: When the monitored file or directory changes, the host environment's implementation of the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Caching.Hosting.IFileChangeNotificationSystem" /> interface raises an event by calling the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Caching.OnChangedCallback" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 當監控的檔案或目錄變更時，主機環境的 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Caching.Hosting.IFileChangeNotificationSystem" /> 介面實作會呼叫 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Caching.OnChangedCallback" /> 類別來引發事件。

trans-unit.source: The state that is supplied by the host environment.
trans-unit.target: 由主機環境提供的狀態。

trans-unit.source: Cache implementations and custom change monitors should treat the state value as opaque.
trans-unit.target: 快取實作和自訂變更監視器應該將狀態值視為不透明。

trans-unit.source: However, the state must be stored so that it can be sent to the host environment when the cache implementation calls the <see cref="M:System.Runtime.Caching.Hosting.IFileChangeNotificationSystem.StopMonitoring(System.String,System.Object)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 但是必須儲存狀態，以便在快取實作呼叫 <see cref="M:System.Runtime.Caching.Hosting.IFileChangeNotificationSystem.StopMonitoring(System.String,System.Object)" /> 方法時，能夠將狀態傳送至主機環境。

trans-unit.source: When this method returns, contains the last date and time that a write operation occurred on <c>filePath</c>.
trans-unit.target: 當此方法傳回時，會包含 <c>filePath</c> 位置上一次發生寫入作業的日期和時間。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is passed uninitialized.
trans-unit.target: 這個參數會以未初始化的狀態傳遞。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is returned from the host environment.
trans-unit.target: 主機環境會傳回此參數。

trans-unit.source: When this method returns, contains the total size of the monitored <c>filePath</c>.
trans-unit.target: 當此方法傳回時，會包含所監控之 <c>filePath</c> 的大小總數。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is passed uninitialized.
trans-unit.target: 這個參數會以未初始化的狀態傳遞。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is returned from the host environment.
trans-unit.target: 主機環境會傳回此參數。

trans-unit.source: Registers a file path to monitor with the host environment.
trans-unit.target: 向主機環境註冊要監控的檔案路徑。

trans-unit.source: This method is used by custom cache objects and custom change monitors that implement the host environment's <xref:System.Runtime.Caching.Hosting.IFileChangeNotificationSystem> interface in order to register file paths for monitoring with the host environment.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法由自訂快取物件和自訂變更實作主機環境的監視<xref:System.Runtime.Caching.Hosting.IFileChangeNotificationSystem>介面，以便註冊用於監視與主機環境的檔案路徑。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Runtime.Caching.Hosting.IFileChangeNotificationSystem.StartMonitoring%2A> method is called by implementers of the <xref:System.Runtime.Caching.Hosting.IFileChangeNotificationSystem> interface in order to register a file or directory for change monitoring.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Runtime.Caching.Hosting.IFileChangeNotificationSystem.StartMonitoring%2A>會呼叫方法的實作器<xref:System.Runtime.Caching.Hosting.IFileChangeNotificationSystem>以便登錄的檔案或目錄變更監視的介面。

trans-unit.source: The path of the file or folder to stop monitoring.
trans-unit.target: 要停止監控之檔案或資料夾的路徑。

trans-unit.source: This should match a file path value that was passed in an earlier call to the <see cref="M:System.Runtime.Caching.Hosting.IFileChangeNotificationSystem.StartMonitoring(System.String,System.Runtime.Caching.OnChangedCallback,System.Object@,System.DateTimeOffset@,System.Int64@)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 這應該符合先前呼叫 <see cref="M:System.Runtime.Caching.Hosting.IFileChangeNotificationSystem.StartMonitoring(System.String,System.Runtime.Caching.OnChangedCallback,System.Object@,System.DateTimeOffset@,System.Int64@)" /> 方法時傳遞的檔案路徑值。

trans-unit.source: The state information that was originally supplied by the host environment during an earlier call to the <see cref="M:System.Runtime.Caching.Hosting.IFileChangeNotificationSystem.StartMonitoring(System.String,System.Runtime.Caching.OnChangedCallback,System.Object@,System.DateTimeOffset@,System.Int64@)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 在先前呼叫 <see cref="M:System.Runtime.Caching.Hosting.IFileChangeNotificationSystem.StartMonitoring(System.String,System.Runtime.Caching.OnChangedCallback,System.Object@,System.DateTimeOffset@,System.Int64@)" /> 方法期間，原本由主機環境提供的狀態資訊。

trans-unit.source: Ends change monitoring.
trans-unit.target: 停止監控變更。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Runtime.Caching.Hosting.IFileChangeNotificationSystem.StopMonitoring%2A> method must be called by custom caches and custom change monitors that are being disposed by the host environment in order to stop monitoring file paths and directories.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Runtime.Caching.Hosting.IFileChangeNotificationSystem.StopMonitoring%2A>必須自訂快取所呼叫的方法，且自訂變更會在主機環境處置若要停止監視檔案路徑和目錄的監視。
